name: Dungeon Adventurer (itch)
description:
How to Play:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move
When walking around in the tall grass, you can encounter an enemy. The player will be presented with 4 abilities to choose from to try to win.

Github Link: https://github.com/Ha1zz/DungeonAdventurer
Contributions:
Luka Ivicevic - https://github.com/Lukatiel - Fade In/Fade Out System - SFX System

Tran Thien Phu (Johnny)- https://github.com/Ha1zz - BattleSystem - RandomEncounterSystem

Youtube Video posted as the trailer for the page.
